{/* Legacy Header */}

NUHU MUHAMMAD DATTI

Founder of 5IRE • AI Architect • Blockchain Pioneer
{/* Hero Section */}
EST. 2023
"Even if my body returns to dust, let my dream feed nations."

From crafting his first learning academy in Primary 3 to architecting blockchain-immortalized educational ecosystems, Datti engineered the future.

While others chased certifications, he chased significance. A diploma failure turned founder. A SIWES student turned digital emperor.

5IRE DECLARATION

  • • EverLearn: Turned games into greatness
  • • ULA: Lecture notes into digital gold
  • • PSI: Brought AI to public service
{/* Final Word */}

"From dust I began, to eternity I echo."

— Legacy Code Line #1, 5IRE Protocol

) }
